margot.sim 0.1.0

Apply censoring to complete data

Source: R/margot-simulate-censoring.R
apply_censoring_post_hoc.Rd

Takes data generated by margot_simulate and applies censoring based on the stored censoring probabilities or a custom censoring function.

Usage

apply_censoring_post_hoc(
  complete_data,
  censoring_type = c("built_in", "custom"),
  censoring_function = NULL,
  apply_process_function = TRUE,
  ...
)

Arguments

complete_data

Data frame from margot_simulate

censoring_type

Character: "built_in" uses stored probabilities, "custom" uses a custom function

censoring_function

Function for custom censoring

apply_process_function

Logical. Apply margot_process_longitudinal?

...

Additional arguments for processing function

Value

Data frame with censoring applied and indicators created
